temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: When the sticks are released/centered the vehicle will actively brake, level, and be locked to a position in 3D space â€” compensating for wind and other forces.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: With full stick deflection the vehicle accelerates initially with MPC_ACC_HOR_MAX ramping down until it reaches the final velocity MPC_VEL_MANUAL.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 2.Let go of the roll and pitch stick and give it enough time to come to a complete stop.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( l2Letrol == pitchstick and gi == iveitenough and rise ( icome == comeacomeacolepetestestoestopopolpop ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 3.Pull the throttle stick down gently until the vehicle touches the ground.
4.Pull the throttle stick all the way down to facilitate and accelerate land detection.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( ePullthrottlestick == facilitate and acceleratelerate == lateladeletectlatecte )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 5.The vehicle will lower propeller thrust, detect the ground and automatically disarm (by default).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( r5vehiclepr == pelerthrtstdetctgroundau and ( automaticalydisar == mbydefauldefauldefaultr ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: The approach is the same as above, except that you must manually ensure that the vehicle stays above the landing spot using the roll and pitch stick.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( aproachtyoumanua == levehiclensure -> landingspotusingr == lpolpol and pitchsticstickick == p )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: After the vehicle is on the ground switch to Stabilized mode keeping the throttle stick low, and manually disarm using a gesture or other command.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( eAtervehicle == groundswitchStah ) and throtlte == tlsicklowmaulalsinuesrm == rmusinuestrmre )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: RC mode where roll, pitch, throttle (RPT) sticks control movement in corresponding axes/directions.
Centered sticks level vehicle and hold it to fixed altitude and position against wind.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( Centerdsticksle == evlevelvehicle and i == fixedaltitudeposit )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 1.Centered roll, pitch, throttle sticks (within RC deadzone MPC_HOLD_DZ) hold x, y, z position steady against any disturbance like wind.
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( l1Centerdrolilp == tchtrotlesticks < RCdeMPCdz ) until ( rise ( CdeaHOLD_DZxyzp == itinx ) ) -> xyzpositednta == dstednainstedagwintdst == isturbanerbacewindi )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: When landed, the vehicle will take off if the throttle stick is raised above 62.5% percent (of the full range from bottom).
temporal_logic_formulars.tl: always ( landedvehicle == ofthrotlestick > 62.5 and ( percentl > 62.5 and percent < fulrlbotttomom ) )

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: 5.Manual control input is required (such as RC control, joystick).
If the estimate falls below acceptable levels, for example due to GPS loss, this may trigger a Position (GPS) Loss Failsafe.

temporal_logic_formulars.sentence: Depending on configuration, whether you have a remote control, and whether there is an adequate altitude estimate, PX4 may switch to altitude mode, manual mode, land mode or terminate.
